heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred beverage resulting from the cooking of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For indigenous cultures, it is a gateway to the spiritual world and a tool for deep healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca works on a physical, mental, and spiritual level. The DMT from the Chacruna, activated by the inhibitors in the vine, allows access to expanded states of consciousness, revealing unconscious patterns, repressed traumas, and connecting us with a higher wisdom to heal and understand.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a teacher. Each ceremony is a unique lesson, tailored to what the individual needs in their process. She teaches, purifies, and guides, always with a purpose of love and evolution.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Ayahuasca often reveals life's purpose and helps in making decisions aligned with the heart.
benefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Ayahuasca often reveals life's purpose and helps in making decisions aligned with the heart.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release emotional burdens, heal past traumas, and resolve internal conflicts. The medicine helps you process and let go of what no longer serves you, bringing inner peace.
benefitHealingDescription: Release emotional burdens, heal past traumas, and resolve internal conflicts. The medicine helps you process and let go of what no longer serves you, bringing inner peace.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with nature, and with the universe. Many describe the experience as a reminder that we are all part of something greater.
benefitConnectionDescription: Experience a deep connection with yourself, with nature, and with the universe. Many describe the experience as a reminder that we are all part of something greater.
groupCeremonyDescription: A contained and safe space where the group's energy enhances individual healing. Sharing the experience with others creates a bond of community and support.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address deep personal processes with the full attention of our guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the people who will accompany you on this sacred journey. Each of our guides brings deep wisdom, respect for the medicine, and an unwavering commitment to your well-being and safety.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and spirit of Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet those who hold the sacred space in our ceremonies.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social media to stay updated on upcoming ceremonies, events, and inspiring content. Connect with people who, like you, are seeking a path of healing and growth.

allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming events and find the perfect journey for you.
authRequiredDescription: You must sign in or create an account to view the details of this ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details. The changes will be reflected immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Complete the form to create a new ceremony in the system.
mediaRequiredDescription: You must provide a URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the past events section.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will not be visible to users. You can reactivate it later.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve with 20% of the value.
editGuideDescription: Modify the guide's details. The image can be a URL or an uploaded file.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
preparationProcessDescription: Days before, you will align your body and mind with a specific diet and clear intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A night of deep introspection, guided by the medicine and our facilitators.
experienceProcessDescription: A journey into your inner self, where you will find visions, healing, and clarity.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in applying the teachings to your daily life.
dietSubtitle: Physical preparation is key. We recommend following these guidelines for at least 3-5 days before the ceremony.
allowedFoodsList: Pure water and caffeine-free herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList: Alcohol, caffeine, and other psychoactive substances
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental and emotional state is crucial for the experience. Here are some practices.
meditationDescription: Dedicate at least 15 minutes a day to meditate. Observe your thoughts without judgment. This will calm your mind and open you to the experience.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal? What questions do you have? Write down your intentions. Be clear and honest. This will serve as your anchor during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Keep a journal of your emotions and dreams in the days leading up to it. The medicine often begins to work before the ceremony itself.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring intense emotions to the surface. Allow yourself to feel without resistance. Vulnerability is your greatest strength in this process. Trust that you are in a safe and contained space to explore these depths. Our guides are there to support you every step of the way.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and a smooth experience.
comfortItemsList: Blanket, pillow, and yoga mat or mattress
preparationCtaDescription: Discover how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
